question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of World Mental Health Day (WMHD)?
option3: Mental Health Promotion and Suicide Prevention
answer: Mental Health Promotion and Suicide Prevention
explanation: The World Mental Health Day (WMHD) is observed every year on 10th of October by World Federation for Mental Health to raise awareness of the scale of suicide around the world and the role that each of us can play to help prevent it. The 2019 theme is “Mental Health Promotion and Suicide Prevention”.
